name: Borrowing money
description: To meet a client's financial need to borrow money to facilitate the purchase of a small or significant asset -unsecured or secured.  This includes personal loans for incidental high value expenses to Vehicle and Home Loans.

products.name: Nedbond
products.shortDescription: A money lending facility offered by the Bank, whereby an amount of money is loaned to a client falling Outside NCA, who undertakes to repay the full amount of the loan over a pre-agreed term at a pre-agreed rate and instalments for the purchase of a commercial property or a loan against the security of an existing commercial property. The loan is secured by a first Covering Mortgage Bond. This facility can also be utilised to accommodate the development of commercial property (building bond).

productFeatures.name: Key Selling Points
productFeatures.description: > A current account is the primary vehicle for managing the flow of funds in and out of an account, without it transactions cannot take place. | > It provides transactional information on the flow of funds (i.e. statements).

productFeatures.name: Competitor Landscape
productFeatures.description: > A current account is a commoditised/generic offering used by banks to leverage brand and innovation.| > Other products can be sold in conjunction with it for the purpose of enhancing overall value delivered the client and growing bank market share. | > Nedbank is the only bank offering Affinity Cheque Accounts that contribute to the following worthy causes: | The Green Trust | The Arts and Culture Trust | The Sports Trust | The Nelson Mandela Childrenâ€™s FundYes Additional Cost.

productFeatures.name: Legal Documents Required
productFeatures.description: > Application for transactional current account - juristic person (company, close corporation, partnership, trusts) | > Terms and conditions of transactional current account | > Standard FICA process and documents as required by compliance (e.g. the process of verifying physical addresses and signature specimens)

products.name: Secured Loan - Miscellaneous
products.shortDescription: A money lending facility offered by the Bank, whereby an amount of money is loaned to a client, who undertakes to repay the full amount of the loan over a pre-agreed term at a pre-agreed rate and instalments. The loan may be secured by the discretion of the Bank.

products.name: Secured Loan - Mortgage Farm Property

The loan is secured by a first Covering Mortgage Bond.

products.name: Medium Term Loan (secured by Mortgage)

productLines.name: Lease
productLines.description: A financial facility offered by the Bank whereby equipment and/or vehicles selected by the client' are purchased by the Bank and then rented onto the client.  Ownership remains vested with the Bank.

products.name: Continuation Lease
products.shortDescription: A continuation lease is available whereby an existing Lease/Rental agreement has come to the end of the agreement period thus has been terminated. The client has the option to enter into an agreement for a further period (normally 12 months) as defined in the termination option in the contractual Terms and Conditions. Ownership does not pass at the end of the agreement.

products.name: Leasing - Vehicles
products.shortDescription: A financial facility offered by the Bank whereby vehicles selected by the client, are purchased by the Bank and then rented onto the client over a pre-agreed term at a pre-agreed rate and instalments. Leases are quoted including VAT. Ownership remains vested with the Bank, however on termination the client has a choice to obtain ownership.

productLines.name: Rental
productLines.description: A financial facility offered by the Bank whereby goods selected by the client' are purchased by the Bank and then rented onto the client.  Ownership does not pass at the end of the agreement.

products.name: Operating Rental Agreement
products.shortDescription: A financial facility offered by the Bank whereby an Asset is selected by the client, purchased by the Bank and then rented onto the client over a pre-agreed term, pre-agreed rate and pre-agreed monthly kilometres where the asset is a vehicle. The instalment is calculated inclusive of admin fees. Rentals are quoted including VAT. Ownership remains vested with the Bank unless a manufacturer or supplier guaranteed buyback is in place.

products.name: Equipment Rental
products.shortDescription: A financial facility offered by the Bank whereby equipment selected by the client, are purchased by the Bank and then rented onto the client over a pre-agreed term at a pre-agreed rate and instalments, inclusive of maintenance fees. productLines.name: Instalment Sale
productLines.description: Defined as a credit transaction entered into with a credit grantor whereby moveable' durable goods are sold to a consumer and all or part of the price is deferred.

products.name: Instalment Agreement - Imports
products.shortDescription: Defined as a credit transaction entered into with a credit grantor whereby moveable, durable goods are sold to a consumer and all or part of the price is deferred and is to be repaid over a pre-agreed term at a pre-agreed rate and instalments. The Bank will be importing the required merchandise/goods from the foreign source (supplier) on behalf of the client.  Ownership of the goods passes to the consumer on termination of the agreement by early settlement or at the end of the agreement period.  Interest fees and charges are payable to the credit provider in respect of the agreement. This product is available to legal entities falling Outside the ambit of NCA.

products.name: Instalment Agreement - Inside NCA
products.shortDescription: Nedbanks CFC accounts are available in all major currencies, the most popular of which are defined as a credit transaction entered into with a credit grantor whereby moveable, durable goods are sold to a consumer and all or part of the price is deferred and is to be repaid over a pre-agreed term at a pre-agreed rate and instalments. Ownership of the goods passes to the consumer on termination of the agreement by early settlement or at the end of the agreement period.  Interest fees and charges are payable to the credit provider in respect of the agreement.This product is available to legal entities falling Outside the ambit of NCA.
